Name: Silk Road
Ingredients: 10 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist .
Review: As the name suggests, the Silk Road harnesses the exotic herbs and spices found in the gin and Bénédictine to deliver a harmonious, flavoursome drink with a silky delivery.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2012 by Tim Sparrow at Barrio North, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Silk Road contains 189 calories
